title: How to Uninstall an Inwall Air Conditioner

steps.title: Remove any trim on the inside and cut away all caulk on the outside.
steps.content: Remove any trim on the inside and cut away all caulk on the outside.

steps.title: Remove the front of the A/C.
steps.content: Remove the front of the A/C.

steps.title: Remove the metal shell, use the wonder bar to pry it out of the wall.
steps.content: Remove the metal shell, use the wonder bar to pry it out of the wall.

steps.title: Frame the opening with 2-by-4s and cut a piece of drywall that will fit.
steps.content: Frame the opening with 2-by-4s and cut a piece of drywall that will fit.

steps.title: Screw the drywall into the 2-by-4 frame and use the joint compound to cover any holes.
steps.content: Screw the drywall into the 2-by-4 frame and use the joint compound to cover any holes.

steps.title: Press tape into the joint compound and add another thing layer of joint compound.
steps.content: Press tape into the joint compound and add another thing layer of joint compound.

steps.title: Cover screw heads with joint compound.
steps.content: Cover screw heads with joint compound.

steps.title: Spread a layer of mud over the joints again.
steps.content: Spread a layer of mud over the joints again.

steps.title: Wait for the compound to dry and then sand it smooth.
steps.content: Wait for the compound to dry and then sand it smooth.

steps.title: Insulate the opening with fiberglass insulation, the paper side goes towards the inside of the home.
steps.content: Insulate the opening with fiberglass insulation, the paper side goes towards the inside of the home.

steps.title: Measure and cut a piece of plywood to cover the hole and screw it into the 2-by-4 frame.
steps.content: Measure and cut a piece of plywood to cover the hole and screw it into the 2-by-4 frame.

steps.title: Nail in the siding and/or shingles.
steps.content: Nail in the siding and/or shingles.

steps.title: Paint the inside/outside as you like.
steps.content: Paint the inside/outside as you like.
